Text: gregduc - thanks for the great app, loaded perfectly. Once you generate a serial with the keygen, how do you activate the software? No read me file in the download, no clues in the help instructions or developer's site. Any idea?

lscribe did you ever figure this out? seems like you need an activation code not serial. I found the machine id, and created the serial and tried using that activation but that didn't work, also didn't work using those 2 items as login & password. Would love to know if you ever found out or just gave up and went on to something different?
